DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Drugs use chemotherapy use different way stop cancer cell divide stop grow die . Combining chemotherapy peripheral stem cell transplantation may allow doctor give high dos chemotherapy drug kill cancer cell . Sometimes transplanted cell reject body 's normal tissue . Antithymocyte globulin may prevent happen . PURPOSE : Phase II trial study effectiveness chemotherapy plus biological therapy follow peripheral stem cell transplantation treat patient hematologic cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Chemotherapy Plus Biological Therapy Followed By Peripheral Stem Cell Transplantation Treating Patients With Hematologic Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine effect nonmyeloablative chemotherapy follow allogeneic peripheral blood stem cell transplantation hematopoietic recovery patient hematologic malignancy . II . Determine toxicity regimen patient . III . Determine frequency mix hematopoietic chimerism patient therapy . IV . Determine efficacy toxicity donor leukocyte infusion relapse patient . V. Determine response rate survival patient therapy . VI . Determine immune reconstitution patient undergoing therapy . OUTLINE : Patients receive fludarabine IV 30 minute day -9 -5 , cyclophosphamide IV 1 hour day -5 , antithymocyte globulin IV 10 hour day -5 -2 . Allogeneic peripheral blood stem cell infuse day 0 . Patients achieve complete remission ( CR ) relapse patient achieve less CR day 60 receive donor leukocyte infusion ( DLI ) 30 minute . DLI repeat necessary persistent disease . Patients follow 1 , 3 , 6 month , 1 2 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 40 patient accrue study within 2 year .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically prove hematologic malignancy standard curative therapy , include , limited : Low grade nonHodgkin 's lymphoma ( NHL ) Mantle cell lymphoma Chronic lymphocytic leukemia ( stage IIIV ) Myelodysplastic syndrome , include : Refractory anemia ( RA ) ring sideroblast RA excess blast ( RAEB ) RAEB transformation Chronic myelomonocytic leukemia Multiple myeloma OR Histologically proven hematologic malignancy fail 1 prior therapy OR high risk relapse , include , limited : Intermediate grade NHL High grade NHL Hodgkin 's disease Acute lymphoblastic lymphoma Acute myelogenous leukemia OR Histologically proven chronic myelogenous leukemia chronic accelerate phase , follow risk factor preclude eligibility standard allogeneic peripheral blood stem cell transplantation : Older age Poor performance status Healthy , partially relate HLA 5/6 6/6 serologic match donor available A new classification scheme adult nonHodgkin 's lymphoma adopt PDQ . The terminology `` indolent '' `` aggressive '' lymphoma replace former terminology `` low '' , `` intermediate '' , `` high '' grade lymphoma . However , protocol us former terminology . PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 18 60 physiologic 70 Performance status : Karnofsky 02 Life expectancy : Not specify Hematopoietic : Not specify Hepatic : Bilirubin le 2.0 mg/dL SGOT SGPT less 2 time normal No active hepatitis Renal : Creatinine le 2.0 mg/dL OR Creatinine clearance great 50 mL/min Cardiovascular : Ejection fraction great 45 % OR Cardiac clearance Pulmonary : DLCO least 50 % predict Other : No active infection HIV1 , HIV2 , HTLV1 negative Not pregnant nurse PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : Not specify Chemotherapy : See Disease Characteristics Endocrine therapy : Not specify Radiotherapy : Not specify Surgery : Not specify
